body_html:
@jart You are welcome.

@datomnurdin I think the actual error reason is in your command argument --image_dir /Users/ZERO/Documents/Github/tensorflow-python/tf_files/images/...
The .. in the end means the parent folder of images folder. So it also find images in folder bottlenecks and inception.
You should delete .. from the argument.
Another point is that I think you should put images in folder "images" in subfolders with folder name as category names
